Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/18th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Cermak, Canal, Roosevelt and Halsted: near Halsted/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Cermak, Canal, Roosevelt, Halsted and over regular route, due to a parade near Halsted/18th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express, #15 Jeffery Local, #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute near Lake Park/55th
ShortDescription: #6 Jackson Park Express, #15 Jeffery Local & #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Lake Park/55th, due to a Marathon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express, #15 Jeffery Local & #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Lake Park/55th, due to a Marathon.

Northbound buses will operate via Stony Island, 63rd, Hayes Drive, Lake Shore Drive, 57th, Hyde Park and 55th.

Southbound buses will operate via Lake Park, 55th, Hyde Park, 57th Cornell Drive, 59th and Stony Island.

Allow extra travel time.
